pages.text: The Advanced Beehive is the heart of your resource production. By placing a specific Resource Bee inside, it will start a work cycle to generate materials.$(br2)Unlike worker bees, these bees do not leave the hive. They require their specific 'flower' block to be placed somewhere nearby to be able to work.

pages.title: Operation
pages.text: 1. Place a Bee Container with a Resource Bee in the input slot.$(br)2. The bee will be released and start its work cycle, flying to its required production block.$(br)3. Upon returning, the hive will start producing. The production speed can be increased with $(l:beeindustry:items/upgrades#efficiency)Efficiency Upgrades$() and the output can be boosted with $(l:beeindustry:items/upgrades#quantity)Quantity Upgrades$().
An essential machine for any aspiring beekeeper.
